Package ru.nsu.lebedev.pizzeria

package ru.nsu.lebedev.pizzeria
  • Class
    Description
    Baker
    Record class representing a baker, implementing JsonSerializable for JSON serialization.
    Courier
    Record class representing a courier, implementing JsonSerializable for JSON serialization.
    EmployeesManager<T extends TerminableEmployee>
    EmployeesManager is responsible for managing a list of pizzeria employees.
    Json
    Utility class for JSON serialization and deserialization using Jackson.
    JsonSerializable
    Interface for classes which will be used for serializing.
    Main
    Main class.
    MyBlockingQueue<T>
    MyBlockingQueue is a custom implementation of a blocking queue using ReentrantLock and Conditions.
    Order
    Record class representing an order in the pizzeria system, implementing JsonSerializable for JSON serialization.
    ParsingException
    Custom exception to handle errors that occur during the parsing of input data.
    Pizzeria
    Pizzeria class for managing the pizzeria's operations and thread launching.
    Setup
    Record class representing the setup data for the pizzeria.
    TerminableEmployee
    TerminableEmployee interface defines the contract for pizzeria employees.
    ThreadBaker
    RunnableBaker represents a baker running in its own thread.
    ThreadCourier
    RunnableCourier represents a courier running in its own thread.
